The [[Muslim Brotherhood]] and the [[Salafi]] movement among other Islamist groups in Egypt think that the amendments are suitable for the time being and that the current situation in Egypt is not perfect for the time to write a new constitution right away. The [[National Democratic Party (Egypt)|NDP]] also have asked their base to vote yes.
+
The [[Muslim Brotherhood]] and the [[Salafi]] movement among other Islamist groups in Egypt think that the amendments are suitable for the time being and that the current situation in Egypt is not perfect for the time to write a new constitution right away. Sheikh [[Yusuf al-Qaradawi]] advised the Egyptians on the 18 of March to vote "yes" on constitutional referendum.<ref>http://www.gulf-times.com/site/topics/article.asp?cu_no=2&item_no=422881&version=1&template_id=36&parent_id=16</ref> The [[National Democratic Party (Egypt)|NDP]] also have asked their base to vote yes.
